evidence_spans: This is a 34-year-old female with a BMI of 43 who is interested in surgical weight via the gastric bypass as opposed to Lap-Band.
She will also see my nutritionist and social worker and have an upper endoscopy.

patient_summary: This is a 34-year-old female who is interested in surgery to help her lose weight. She needs to see a nutritionist, social worker, and has an upper endoscopy. She needs a letter of medical necessity from Dr. XYZ. She also needs approval from her insurance company.
